ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Any tips for Wizards?
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool! Thanks. Btw, did anyone notice that eqmaps.com is now a member only thing? I was very disappointed about that. luv, -Su ... faction ... (just
ygData.messageBody:
Cool! Thanks.
Btw, did anyone notice that eqmaps.com is now a member only thing?
I was very disappointed about that.
luv,
-Su

> I can only give advice that says to go to everlore.com and find that guide
> written by an Iksar. Telling in detail how to get at least dubious
faction
> with the area of Qeynos.
